title: Golden remains of the ever memorable Mr. John Hales ... with additions from the authours own copy, viz., sermons & miscellanies, also letters and expresses concerning the Synod of Dort (not before printed), from an authentick hand.
author: Hales, John, 1584-1656.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Newcomb for Robert Pawlet ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Folger Library.
"A tract concerning schisme": 7 p. at end.
